Article Title: Mumbai Indians Retained and Released Players: MI IPL 2026 Retention List
Article Text: Mumbai Indians revealed their IPL 2026 player list, retaining key talent and releasing others ahead of the Abu Dhabi mini-auction. The five-time champions, seeking to recapture past glory after a mixed run since their 2020 title, have seen significant leadership changes. This strategic move sets the stage for a crucial rebuilding phase for the iconic franchise.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians have revealed their ipl 2026 player list. The five-time champions are seeking to recapture past glory after a mixed run since their 2020 title. This strategic move sets the stage for a crucial rebuilding phase for the iconic franchise.

Article Title: Davante Adams injury update: Will Rams star wide receiver play against Seahawks in Week 11?
Article Text:
Davante Adams expected to play in Week 11 (Image via: Getty Images)

Coach Sean McVay provides update on Davante Adams’ status for Week 11



More coverage in NFL:





The Los Angeles Rams are heading into a crucial Week 11 matchup against the Seattle Seahawks, and wide receiver Davante Adams’ injury has become a major focus. Adams suffered an oblique injury during the Week 10 victory over the San Francisco 49ers, raising questions about his readiness. His health and availability could have significant implications for the Rams’ passing game and fantasy football lineups.Davante Adams’ health has become a key focus for the Los Angeles Rams as they prepare for their Week 11 matchup against the Seattle Seahawks. The star wide receiver sustained an oblique injury in Week 10, and his readiness could have a major impact on the team’s passing attack. Throughout the week, Adams has been monitored closely in practice, participating in limited sessions as the team assesses his condition.Davante Adams remains a critical part of the Rams’ offense, even against Seattle’s elite pass defense. While the Seahawks give up the seventh-fewest points to wide receivers this season, Adams’ consistent production and scoring ability continue to make him one of the league’s top-performing receivers.Head coach Sean McVay provided updates on Adams’ condition and readiness. “He’s making good progress. That’s what he tells me.He's feeling good, and so I trust the man. He'll be ready.,” McVay said. He also noted that Adams could have returned in Week 10 if the score had been closer, signaling that the injury is not serious. These remarks highlight Adams’ importance to the Rams’ offense and his potential impact in Week 11.With nine receiving touchdowns, Adams ranks WR7 in fantasy points per game, making him a reliable WR1 option. His ability to score and produce consistently outweighs matchup concerns, ensuring his status as one of the NFL ’s top wide receivers.The Rams are continuing to monitor Davante Adams’ progress closely as they approach Sunday’s matchup against the Seattle Seahawks. His health, recovery, and availability are expected to play a significant role in the effectiveness of the team’s passing attack, while his presence on the field could directly influence the overall offensive performance and game plan for Los Angeles in Week 11.
Article Summary: Coach sean mcvay provides update on davante adams’ status for week 11. The star wide receiver sustained an oblique injury in week 10. His readiness could have a major impact on the team’s passing attack. With nine receiving touchdowns, adams ranks wr7 in fantasy points per game.

Article Title: All about NFL legend Kenny Easley’s personal life: Wife and children as his untimely demise leaves the world mourning
Article Text:
Kenny Easley has passed away.(Image via Getty Images)

Kenny Easley mostly kept his personal life and his family away from the spotlight



Kenny Easley had a complex relationship with the Seattle Seahawks after he sued the team in 1989 for his health issues



More coverage on the NFL -





Kenny Easley, the 66 year old NFL legend, has left the world mourning after he passed away a few hours ago.At this point in time, the cause of his untimely passing has not been made public yet, but his tragic death has sparked chaos among fans. While Kenny Easley’s career in the league remained controversial, he has also kept his family out of the spotlight.As per reports, the NFL legend has left behind his wife, Gail Easley and their three children.Kenny Easley and his wife, Gail Easley, mostly always kept their children out of the spotlight but as per reports, the two have a son named Kendrick Easley and two daughter, Gabrielle Manhertz and Giordanna Easley.While Kenny Easley’s death has sparked panic among his fans, his family has maintained silence and no information on the memorial services has been made public.Kenny Easley had a pretty complicated relationship with his former team, the Seattle Seahawks, as he even ended up suing the team in April 1989 for his kidney problems, as he blamed the Seahawks for it.Back in 2017, Kenny Easley spoke about reconciliation with the team as he said, "It was good that the reconciliation happened.To be honest, I never gave it much thought, because I was wallowing in my own anger. I thought I was done unfairly, it didn't have to happen what happened to me, and it took me a while to get over that."Amid all the mess, the Seattle Seahawks released a heartbreaking statement over Kenny Easley’s death a few hours ago.The statement read as, "We are deeply saddened by the passing of Seahawks Legend Kenny Easley. Kenny embodied what it meant to be a Seahawk through his leadership, toughness, intensity, and fearlessness…His intimidating nature and athletic grace made him one the best players of all-time.The statement added, "A man of faith, Kenny will forever be remembered as a beloved member of the Seahawks family and his legacy will live on as an inspiration to fans around the world. We extend our sincere condolences to his wife, Gail, and children Kendrick, Gabrielle and Giordanna."
Article Summary: Kenny easley, the 66 year old nfl legend, has left the world mourning after he passed away a few hours ago. The cause of his untimely passing has not been made public yet, but his tragic death has sparked chaos among fans. While kenny easley’s career in the league remained controversial, he has also kept his family out of the spotlight.

Article Title: Chennai Super Kings Retained and Released Players: CSK IPL 2026 Retention List
Article Text:
Chennai Super Kings (PTI Photo/Shahbaz Khan)

IPL 2026 retained players: Who stayed where and for how much

CSK Released Players (2026)

No. Player Name Notes 1 Ravindra Jadeja Traded to RR 2 Matheesha Pathirana

Released 3 Devon Conway Released 4 Rachin Ravindra Released 5 Sam Curran Traded to RR 6 Rahul Tripathi Released 7 Vansh Bedi Released 8 C Andre Siddarth Released 9 Deepak Hooda Released 10 Vijay Shankar Released 11 Shaik Rasheed Released 12 Kamlesh Nagarkoti Released

CSK Retained Players (2026)

No. Player Name Notes 1 Ruturaj Gaikwad Retained 2 Ayush Mhatre Retained 3 Dewald Brevis Retained 4 MS Dhoni Retained 5 Urvil Patel Retained 6 Sanju Samson Traded from RR 7 Shivam Dube Retained 8 Jamie Overton Retained 9 Ramakrishna Ghosh Retained 10 Noor Ahmad Retained 11 Khaleel Ahmad Retained 12 Anshul Kamboj Retained 13 Gurjanpreet Singh Retained 14 Nathan Ellis Retained 15 Shreyas Gopal Retained 16 Mukesh Choudhary Retained

Auction Details:





In a blockbuster trade ahead of IPL 2026, Chennai Super Kings (CSK) have acquired veteran Indian wicketkeeper-batter Sanju Samson from Rajasthan Royals (RR), while sending Men in Yellow legend Ravindra Jadeja and Sam Curran to RR. This move marks one of the biggest trade deals in IPL history.CSK Managing Director Kasi Viswanathan described the decision to part ways with Jadeja as one of the toughest the franchise has faced. “We felt the need for a top-order Indian batsman, and since not many Indian batsmen will be available at the auction, the trade window was the best option. Leaving Jaddu was extremely difficult given his contribution to CSK’s success over the years,” Viswanathan said in a video released by the team.Jadeja, who represented RR in 2008-09 and CSK from 2012 to 2025 (with brief stints at Kochi Tuskers Kerala and Gujarat Lions), leaves as CSK’s leading wicket-taker with 143 scalps in 186 matches and their highest run-getter in IPL history with 2,198 runs.CSK will have ₹43.4 crore left to spend at the IPL 2026 mega auction. They have 9 slots remaining to fill in the upcoming season.
Article Summary: Csk have acquired wicketkeeper-batter sanju samson from rajasthan royals. Ravindra jadeja and sam curran have been sent to rr. Csk will have ₹43.4 crore left to spend at the ipl 2026 mega auction. Ms dhoni retained by chennai super kings.

As the 2026 Indian Premier League (IPL) approaches, Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) enter another defining phase in their brief but eventful journey. Since joining the league in 2022, the franchise has experienced early playoff highs, difficult downturns, and seasons shaped by injuries, form slumps and constant rebuilding.Their campaigns have often revolved around sharp pace bowling, tactical flexibility and a core that mixed promising youth with seasoned performers. But the last season exposed significant gaps, especially in the fast-bowling group, forcing LSG back to the drawing board as they prepare for a crucial reset ahead of IPL 2026.In the previous campaign, Australia's Mitchell Marsh top scored for the the side with 627 runs in 13 matches - the joint-lowest in terms of matches played among the top 10 players with most runs last season. Surprisingly, no other player found room in the top 10, despite an explosive start from Nicholas Pooran, who ended the campaign on 524 in 14 games.Skipper Rishabh Pant , who was also the most expensive, ended the campaign with just 269 runs in 14 matches. He was brought to the side for a mammoth Rs 27 crore.LSG's bowlers were far from their best too, as no bowler found spot among the top 10 wicket takers. In fact, it was Digvesh Rathi who led the pack with 14 wickets from 13 matches. The franchise's focus will be on doing better in this department as they finalize their retentions and releases and head to the auction.
Article Summary: Lsg finished fifth, just one point outside the playoffs spot in the 2025 season after a stop-start campaign. No bowler found spot among the top 10 wicket takers. The franchise's focus will be on doing better in this department as they finalize their retentions and releases and head to the auction.

Article Title: Royal Challengers Bengaluru Retained and Released Players: RCB IPL 2026 Retention List
Article Text:
After the 2025 IPL triumph, RCB's focus shifted to retaining their crown with crucial retentions and smart releases. (Photo by Pankaj Nangia/Getty Images)

IPL 2026 retained players: Who stayed where and for how much

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

As the 2026 Indian Premier League approaches, Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) enter the new season with a long history of strong squads, heavy expectations and a fan base that has remained one of the most loyal in the tournament.Their journey across seasons has swung between high-scoring spectacles, deep playoff pushes and repeated attempts to secure the league’s most elusive prize.That pursuit finally ended with their title breakthrough last season. RCB produced one of their most complete campaigns, driven by consistent top-order runs, reliable middle-overs control and a bowling group that delivered in pressure situations.Several players stood out through the year, forming the spine of the championship run and shaping the core the team now carries into 2026.Virat Kohli led the charge with 657 runs, producing eight half-centuries, that too, all in wins, and setting the tone with his aggressive approach in the powerplay. Phil Salt complemented him with rapid starts of his own, striking at 175.98 and consistently breaking open the first six overs.Rajat Patidar’s return as captain added stability, with crucial early-season half-centuries in important away wins that helped steady the side’s route to the final.Their bowling unit matched the batting group’s impact as well. Josh Hazlewood’s 22 wickets, including decisive powerplay bursts and death-overs control, turned tight games in RCB’s favour, while Krunal Pandya’s 17 wickets and late-order utility added balance.Jitesh Sharma and Romario Shepherd provided the finishing punch, delivering high-impact cameos in must-win situations. The abundance of match-winners across departments became the defining trait of RCB's campaign and the backbone of their climb to the title.The win also marked a shift in the side’s approach. After years of depending heavily on individual brilliance, RCB’s 2025 campaign was built on a collective effort, with contributions spread across departments. Their late-season surge, which carried them through the playoffs and into the final, highlighted that shift and has now become the base for their upcoming plans.The focus now shifts to building around the title-winning team. The retained core offers experience and consistency, while younger players who impressed in the previous season add depth.: Rs 16.4 crore: 8 (2 overseas)RCB, the defending champions, will have Rs 16.4 crore going into the auction, but they already have a settled playing eleven and would only look to solidify themselves by adding backups.
Article Summary: After the 2025 ipl triumph, rcb's focus shifted to retaining their crown with crucial retentions and smart releases. Rcb produced one of their most complete campaigns, driven by consistent top-order runs, reliable middle-overs control and a bowling group that delivered in pressure situations.

Article Title: Punjab Kings Retained and Released Players: PBKS IPL 2026 Retention List
Article Text:
Shreyas Iyer (Image credit: BCCI/IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

IPL 2026 retained players: Who stayed where and for how much

Full List of Players Retained by PBKS for IPL 2026



Players Released by PBKS Ahead of IPL 2026 Auction

AUCTION BUDGET:





As the 2026 Indian Premier League draws closer, Punjab Kings will look to bounce back from the heartbreak of the previous season and launch a renewed campaign for their maiden IPL trophy. Under the leadership of Shreyas Iyer, PBKS came agonisingly close in IPL 2025, falling just six runs short against Royal Challengers Bengaluru in a thrilling final. Despite the defeat, Punjab’s performance throughout the season reflected significant improvement and marked one of their strongest campaigns in recent years.In IPL 2025, Punjab Kings finished at the top of the points table, showcasing remarkable consistency. They won 10 of their 17 matches, with six losses and one no-result, registering an impressive win percentage of 63.64%. Their journey to the final included a confident victory over Mumbai Indians in Qualifier 2, reinforcing their status as one of the most balanced and competitive sides of the season.The 2025 squad featured a strong mix of experienced international stars and promising young Indian talent. Led by Shreyas Iyer, the squad included dynamic players like Glenn Maxwell, Marcus Stoinis, Josh Inglis and Marco Jansen, while homegrown talents such as Prabhsimran Singh, Arshdeep Singh, Harpreet Brar, Shashank Singh and Nehal Wadhera played pivotal roles.Rising names like Xavier Bartlett, Priyansh Arya, Musheer Khan and Suryansh Shedge added depth and energy to the lineup. This combination of youth and experience was one of the biggest strengths of PBKS in 2025.The franchise’s historical performance in the IPL highlights its inconsistent yet occasionally brilliant journey. As Kings XI Punjab, the team enjoyed strong seasons in 2008 and 2014, finishing as semi-finalists and runners-up respectively. However, they also endured several years at the bottom of the table. After rebranding to Punjab Kings in 2021, the team’s fortunes fluctuated but eventually surged in 2025 when they topped the league standings and finished as runners-up—signalling a resurgence under new leadership.The table of past seasons clearly reflects the team’s evolution: a mix of mid-table finishes, a few disappointing campaigns, and standout years where they looked like title contenders. The dramatic turnaround in 2025 stands out as their best finish since the famous 2014 season.Shreyas Iyer (c), Nehal Wadhera, Priyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh, Shashank Singh, Pyla Avinash, Harnoor Pannu, Musheer Khan, Vishnu Vinod, Marcus Stoinis, Azmatullah Omarzai, Suryansh Shedge, Mitchell Owen, Arshdeep Singh, Vijaykumar Vyshak, Yash Thakur, Xavier Bartlett, Lockie Ferguson, Yuzvendra Chahal, Harpreet BrarGlenn Maxwell, Josh Inglis, Aaron Hardie, Kuldeep Sen, Praveen DubeyRs 11.50 crore is left for Punjab to spend in the upcoming auction, and they have the second-lowest purse going into the auction after Mumbai Indians.
Article Summary: In ipl 2025, punjab kings finished at the top of the points table, showcasing remarkable consistency. They won 10 of their 17 matches, with six losses and one no-result, registering an impressive win percentage of 63.64%.

Article Title: Gujarat Titans Retained and Released Players: GT IPL 2026 Retention List
Article Text:
Sai Kishore of Gujrat Titans celebrates with teammates after dismissing Suryakumar Yadav of Mumbai Indians during the 2025 Eliminator IPL Finals match between Gujarat Titans and Mumbai Indians at New PCA Stadium on May 30, 2025, in Chandigarh, India. (Photo/Getty Images)

IPL 2026 retained players: Who stayed where and for how much

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Full List of Players Retained by GT for IPL 2026



Players Released by GT Ahead of IPL 2026 Auction







NEW DELHI: Gujarat Titans have announced their retention list for the IPL 2026 season, confirming the core group that will remain with the franchise ahead of the upcoming mega auction.The 2022 champions have held on to key stars including captain Shubman Gill, Rashid Khan, Sai Sudharsan, Rahul Tewatia, Shahrukh Khan, Jos Buttler, Mohammed Siraj and others who continue to be central to their plans.As part of the restructuring process, the Titans have released Gerald Coetzee, Karim Janat, Mahipal Lomror, Dasun Shanaka and Kulwant Khejroliya, aiming to strengthen specific areas for the new season. Earlier, Sherfane Rutherford was traded to Mumbai Indians.Vikram Solanki, Director of Cricket, said: “Our strategy was to retain a core that aligns with the long-term vision of Gujarat Titans. We want continuity, balance and a strong pipeline that adds to Indian cricket’s future. We thank the released players for their contributions and wish them the best for what comes next.”Head coach Ashish Nehra added: “This retained group gives us clarity and balance as we prepare for the season ahead.”Last year’s runners-up will enter the IPL 2026 auction with a purse of Rs 12.9 crore and five available slots, including four for overseas players, as they aim to mount another strong title challenge.Shubman Gill (c), Rashid Khan, Sai Sudharsan, Rahul Tewatia, Shahrukh Khan, Kagiso Rabada, Jos Buttler, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna, Nishant Sindhu, Kumar Kushagra, Anuj Rawat, Manav Suthar, Washington Sundar, Arshad Khan, Gurnoor Brar, Sai Kishore, Ishant Sharma, Jayant Yadav, Glenn Phillips.Karim Janat, Kulwant Khejroliya, Gerald Coetzee, Dasun Shanaka, Mahipal Lomror.GT, ahead of this auction, look very settled and won’t be looking to buy many players. With their playing eleven almost set, they will mainly look to add backups.
Article Summary: Gujarat titans have announced their retention list for the ipl 2026 season. The 2022 champions have held on to key stars including captain shubman gill. Gerald coetzee, karim janat, mahipal lomror, dasun shanaka and kulwant khejroliya have been released. Sherfane rutherford was traded to mumbai indians.

Article Title: What did Stephen Curry say about John Beam? Golden State Warriors star's heartfelt tribute after legendary coach's demise shakes Bay Area
Article Text:
Stephen Curry opened up about legendary coach John Beam (Image via NBA)

Steph Curry’s emotional words echo through the Bay Area as a community mourns a fallen icon

STEPH CURRY = “Hayley Williams of Paramore tonight”; GARY PAYTON 2: he’s fully healthy now…we follow





Following the death of Laney College football "icon" John Beam in a "senseless" attack, Golden State star Stephen Curry delivered a heartfelt message to Beam's family. Beam, who participated in the 2020 college football documentary series "Last Chance U" on Netflix, is thought to have been shot in the head on Thursday at the Oakland campus where he was employed as athletic director.Additionally, Steve Kerr, the Warriors coach, began his pregame press conference on Friday night by honoring the longtime football coach. Kerr began his pregame press conference in San Antonio on Friday night by speaking about his admiration for the late football coach and Oakland legend while wearing a white shirt with the words "John Beam.”After being taken to the hospital, he eventually passed away from his wounds. Cedric Irving Jr. was detained by police early on Friday morning. However, Beam's death has shaken the Bay Area, and Curry honored the deceased coach following the game. He said:“Being from the Bay and understanding the icon that was lost - John Beam - I'm sending all thoughts and prayers to his family and the whole Laney College Community and all of Oakland.. Senseless violence is tough. It puts in perspective what we get to do everyday. But I know he was a legend and touched a lot of lives. So I just want to acknowledge that…”When asked if he had ever met Beam before to his untimely demise at the age of 66, Curry responded:“I did not…”Wearing a "John Beam" t-shirt, Warriors head coach Steve Kerr honored the late football legend at the start of his press conference prior to the game. Kerr stated:“Today is a really, really sad day - a sad day for the Bay Area, for Coach Beam's family and everyone in Oakland. He was a revered figure in Oakland - he did so much for so many people and so, on behalf of the Warriors, I just want to extend our condolences and remind everybody that we have to be the change. As a community, as citizens, we have to be the ones who insist that we address the gun violence issue in this country.”After more than 40 years as a successful football coach, Beam was a beloved member of the college athletics community.He is left by his wife Cindi, two kids, and two granddaughters. Meanwhile, in a statement, the family characterized him as a devoted husband, father, grandpa, brother, uncle, coach, mentor, and friend.At a news conference on Friday afternoon, police released a statement from Beam's family:"We are devastated that John Beam, our loving husband, father, grandfather, brother, uncle, coach, mentor, and friend, has passed… Our hearts are full from the outpouring of love and support from all who cared about him. We are deeply grateful for your continued prayers, well wishes and thoughts. At this time, we kindly ask everyone to fully respect our family's privacy."According to the police, a gun was found and the suspect was apprehended without incident.The suspect was known to hang about Laney's campus, according to Oakland police assistant chief James Beere. He did not go into additional detail, but he said that the suspect was on campus for a "specific reason."Additionally, no other information has been made available regarding the tragic incident. On the other hand, as of yet, no other NBA players have said anything about it.Also read: Is Stephen Curry playing tonight Vs Oklahoma City Thunder? Golden State Warriors legend's status and health issues revealed (11-11-2025)
Article Summary: Laney college football "icon" john beam was shot in the head on thursday. Golden state warriors star stephen curry paid tribute to the late coach. Steve kerr also wore a shirt with the words "john beam" during his pregame press conference.

Article Title: Where is Blackhawks defenseman Shea Weber?: The reason behind his long NHL hiatus
Article Text:
Shea Weber is a renowned Canadian professional ice hockey defenseman who has been away from the NHL since 2021 (Image via NHL)

What are the reasons behind Blackhawk defenseman Shea Weber’s absence from the league?

Hockey Hall of Fame Induction Speech: Shea Weber

Also read:





Shea Weber is a renowned Canadian professional ice hockey defenseman widely regarded as one of the most dominant blueliners of his era. He was recently traded to Chicago by Utah with Aku Raty and Victor Soderstrom for a 5th-round pick in the 2026 NHL Draft, March 7, 2025. He is one of the best players in the NHL, who was inducted into the Hockey Hall of Fame in 2024. However, the Blackhawks defenseman has been out of action in the league for quite a long time. But what are the chances of his return to the ice? Let’s find out here in this article.As we all know, Shea Weber has been away from the league for a long time. As per reports, the former Montreal Canadien captain was last seen in action against the Lightning on July 7, 2021, which ended up being Weber's last NHL game due to injuries.However, Weber did not officially retire after that season. He was traded to the Vegas Golden Knights and then again to the Arizona Coyotes. Weber was acquired by the Chicago Blackhawks with a $7.86 million salary cap on March 7, 2025.The main reason behind his long hiatus from the league is due to his chronic foot and ankle injuries, and he is on the long-term injured reserve list, effectively out of the ice for a long time, since 2021. The status of his return to the league is still unknown to the NHL insiders and the Blackhawks organization.Reports suggest Weber finished his career playing 1,038 games and recording 589 points (224 goals and 365 assists). Apart from the Hockey Hall of Fame, he also earned the Mark Messier Leadership Award in 2016 and was named to the NHL's first and second all-star teams twice each. He never won a Norris Trophy but was a finalist three times.Drafted 49th overall by the Nashville Predators in 2003, he became the cornerstone of their defence for over a decade and served as team captain before being traded to the Montreal Canadiens. Known for his physical style of play, leadership, and a famously powerful slapshot, Weber earned multiple NHL All-Star selections and won hardest-shot competitions.In addition to this, he has also played a key role for Team Canada, capturing Olympic gold medals in both 2010 and 2014. Though injuries eventually sidelined him and his playing career wound down, his impact on the sport will be remembered forever by his fans, even if he decides to retire from the NHL.
Article Summary: Shea weber is a renowned canadian professional ice hockey defenseman who has been away from the nhl since 2021. He was recently traded to chicago by utah with aku raty and victor soderstrom for a 5th-round pick in the 2026 nhl draft, march 7, 2025. The status of his return to the league is still unknown to the nhl insiders and the blackhawks organization.

NEW DELHI: Kolkata Knight Riders and Chennai Super Kings are set to headline the bidding battles at next month’s IPL mini-auction in Abu Dhabi on December 16, boasting the biggest available purses among all 10 franchises.KKR will go into the auction with Rs 63.4 crore after parting ways with high-value underperformers Venkatesh Iyer (Rs 23.75 crore) and Andre Russell (Rs 12 crore). CSK, meanwhile, have freed up Rs 40 crore despite trading in Sanju Samson, by letting go of multiple senior names.KKR aim to significantly revamp their squad, while CSK are expected to rebuild their bowling unit — with a possible bid to buy back Matheesha Pathirana or pursue Ben Stokes, subject to his post-Ashes availability.KKR have also released Quinton de Kock, Moeen Ali, and Anrich Nortje, while retaining an experienced and dynamic core featuring Sunil Narine, Varun Chakaravarthy, Rinku Singh, Ajinkya Rahane, Manish Pandey, Harshit Rana and Angkrish Raghuvanshi. They currently have 13 vacant slots, including six overseas spots.In the trading window, Ravindra Jadeja has moved to Rajasthan Royals and Sanju Samson has shifted to Chennai Super Kings — two of the biggest transfers in IPL history.As per an IPL advisory, Jadeja’s fee has been revised from Rs 18 crore to Rs 14 crore, while Samson will continue at his existing fee of Rs 18 crore. Samson, who has played 177 IPL matches since debuting in 2013, joins CSK as only his third franchise.England all-rounder Sam Curran will also join RR at his existing fee of Rs 2.4 crore.Veteran pacer Mohammed Shami has been traded to Lucknow Super Giants from Sunrisers Hyderabad at his existing fee of Rs 10 crore. After missing IPL 2024 due to injury, he remains a prized asset, having taken 20 wickets in Gujarat Titans’ 2023 title win.Arjun Tendulkar will join Lucknow Super Giants from Mumbai Indians at Rs 30 lakh, while Nitish Rana will represent Delhi Capitals after a move from Rajasthan Royals at Rs 4.2 crore. South Africa’s Donovan Ferreira returns to Rajasthan Royals from Delhi Capitals at a revised fee of Rs 1 crore.Delhi Capitals have released six players — including Faf du Plessis and Jake Fraser-McGurk — while retaining a strong core with Axar Patel, KL Rahul, Kuldeep Yadav, Mitchell Starc and Tristan Stubbs among others.Gujarat Titans have released five players — Karim Janat, Kulwant Khejroliya, Gerald Coetzee, Dasun Shanaka and Mahipal Lomror — while trading Sherfane Rutherford to Mumbai Indians.CSK have released several notable names including Devon Conway, Rachin Ravindra, R Ashwin, Deepak Hooda, Sam Curran and Matheesha Pathirana.Sunrisers Hyderabad have parted ways with eight players, including Mohammed Shami, Adam Zampa and Rahul Chahar.Punjab Kings released Glenn Maxwell, Josh Inglis, Aaron Hardie, Kuldeep Sen and Praveen Dubey.Mumbai Indians have released nine players — notably Reece Topley, Karn Sharma, Mujeeb ur Rahman and Vignesh Puthur.Lucknow Super Giants have released Akashdeep, Ravi Bishnoi and David Miller — all significant exits.All released players will now enter the mini-auction pool.: Shubman Gill (c), Sai Sudharsan, Kumar Kushagra, Anuj Article Title: John Tortorella pays tribute to late Larry Brooks: The Rangers reporter who challenged him like no other
Article Text:
Tired of too many ads? go ad free now

Rangers Coach and NHL Reporter clash: John Tortorella and Larry Brooks’ legendary exchanges

Tired of too many ads? go ad free now

John Tortorella and Larry Brooks spent years on opposite sides of some of hockey’s most unforgettable coach-reporter clashes. Their exchanges often exploded into headline-worthy moments, shaping a unique chapter in the New York Rangers’ media landscape. But when news surfaced of Brooks’ passing, Tortorella set aside the fiery past and chose to remember the man who stood across from him with unwavering conviction.For Tortorella, Brooks wasn’t just the journalist who challenged him; he was a constant presence, someone who asked tough questions without hesitation and always showed up the next day, no matter how intense the previous encounter had been. That consistency, John Tortorella admitted, was what earned Larry Brooks his lasting respect.During Tortorella’s tenure as the New York Rangers’ head coach, his back-and-forth with Brooks became some of the most replayed moments in NHL media. Their tension began even before Tortorella took the Rangers job. In 2007, while still coaching the Tampa Bay Lightning, he clashed with Brooks during a media scrum after a round of pointed questions. It set the tone for years of memorable confrontations.From the 2010 moment when Tortorella refused a question from Brooks, to the infamous quip about Brooks being “beat up at the bus stop,” their exchanges were fiery, unfiltered, and often tense. In 2011, the friction returned during the Stanley Cup Playoffs, with both men accusing the other of twisting words or stirring unnecessary conflict. Yet, through every argument, neither backed down.Tortorella made it clear in his tribute that despite the confrontations, he never felt disrespected by Brooks. What he remembered most was the journalist’s persistence, professionalism, and willingness to show up day after day, regardless of how heated things had been. “We disagree, and we go at it,” Tortorella said. “But he’d be right back the next day.”Larry Brooks leaves behind a legacy as one of the most impactful voices in Rangers and NHL reporting. And through Tortorella’s words, it reminded that some of the toughest rivalries in sports come from mutual dedication, not animosity, but a shared commitment to the truth of the game.
Article Summary: John tortorella and larry brooks were on opposite sides of some of hockey’s most unforgettable coach-reporter clashes. Their exchanges often exploded into headline-worthy moments, shaping a unique chapter in the new york rangers’ media landscape.

Article Title: How did Cody Beef Franke die? Inside the tragic end of the Barstool Sports star
Article Text:
Cody Beef Franke (Image Source: barstoolyak/Instagram)

Cody Franke’s final days and what reportedly happened

Tributes pour in for Cody Franke’s lasting impact

“you will never find a nicer or more genuine person than Beef,”

to him, seeing golf make people happy, made him happy.”





Cody "Beef" Franke, who quickly became a fan favorite on Barstool Sports' Fore Play golf podcast, has passed away at 31 after what has been called a "sudden medical event." Barstool Sports confirmed the tragic news earlier this week, and fans and colleagues were crushed. His personality, humor, and love for golf were infectious, and in no time, Franke had developed a quick following all over the Barstool universe, and even outside of it.Based on several reports, Cody Franke experienced a medical emergency while in the Dominican Republic attending a wedding. Barstool Sports reported, while not disclosing a specific cause of death, that he died from a sudden health issue over the weekend, calling the incident unexpected and sudden.Cody Franke, who was a former PGA professional, had come on board with Barstool Sports earlier in 2025 to serve as the Lead Golf Pro for the company's golf wing. With instructional videos, swing tips and relatable golf content, he developed a reputation for being not only a great golfer but an accessible one at that. His genuine personality and positive nature made him one of the more prominent figures in golf content.Colleagues said he was always kind, on and off the course. Perhaps the most famous piece of body language he used was taking his hat off as a gesture of respect, which had become a trademark of his person and a way of symbolizing the kindness that characterized him.Also Read: Mannat ends T-13th, Chinese reign supreme at Asian Youth Games golf Following the devastating announcement, tributes poured in from across the sports and media landscape. Barstool Sports founder Dave Portnoy expressed his grief, writing thatcalling it a cruel reminder that tomorrow is never promised.Franke, a "lover of the game of golf" who enjoyed helping others appreciate the game, was also remembered in a heartfelt statement released by the Fore Play team. His love of the game was contagious, they wrote, and “Everyone with a story about meeting Franke has regaled their social media followers with the details of exactly how personable, reachable, and kind he was when met in every instance. For years, he had been the hard-working, humble and appropriately described the nicest guy in golf media.
Article Summary: Cody "beef" franke, a former pga professional, has passed away at 31. He was the lead golf pro for barstool sports' fore play golf podcast. Franke's death has been called a "sudden medical event"

Article Title: Seth Jarvis injury update: Andrei Svechnikov’s high stick takes Hurricanes forward out with upper-body setback
Article Text:
Seth Jarvis out after Andrei Svechnikov’s high stick (Image via: Getty Images)

Upper-body setback sidelines Seth Jarvis for Carolina Hurricanes



More coverage on NHL:





The Carolina Hurricanes experienced a concerning moment on Friday night when forward Seth Jarvis was forced to leave the game due to an upper-body setback. During a play behind the net, Jarvis was struck near the eye by teammate Andrei Svechnikov’s high stick. He did not return for the remainder of the first period, with the team listing the incident as an upper-body issue. The play was sudden and highlighted the physical intensity of NHL games, even in routine situations.Jarvis has been a key contributor for Carolina this season, entering the night with 10 goals and five assists through 16 games. At 23 years old, his offensive production has been integral to the Hurricanes’ early-season performance, and his temporary absence may affect line rotations and scoring depth. Known for his speed, vision, and scoring ability, Jarvis has emerged as one of Carolina’s most promising young forwards.Injuries involving the upper body, particularly near the eye, are taken seriously due to their potential impact on a player’s vision, mobility, and overall performance. Carolina’s coaching and medical staff are monitoring his condition closely, focusing on a cautious approach to ensure full recovery.Even a short absence can influence team dynamics, and the Hurricanes are likely to make tactical adjustments to maintain offensive balance while he recovers.The incident underscores the physical risks inherent in professional hockey, where even routine plays can have unexpected consequences. Carolina’s depth chart may need adjustments while Jarvis is unavailable, with other forwards stepping into increased responsibilities. His experience and familiarity with the team’s systems will be missed, but the organization is prepared to adapt while evaluating the full extent of his setback. Updates on Jarvis’ status are expected in the coming days as the Hurricanes’ medical team continues its assessment.Additionally, this injury could influence upcoming matchups as the Hurricanes manage their roster and line combinations. Coaching staff may adjust strategies, modify power-play and penalty-kill units, and shift responsibilities among forwards to compensate for Jarvis’ absence. Maintaining offensive consistency without Jarvis will be a priority, while ensuring he receives proper care to return at full strength.
Article Summary: Seth jarvis was struck near the eye by teammate andrei svechnikov’s high stick. He did not return for the remainder of the first period, with the team listing the incident as an upper-body issue. Jarvis has been a key contributor for carolina this season with 10 goals and five assists.

Article Title: MLB trade rumors: Boston Red Sox eye $53 million Cincinnati Reds star as Wilyer Abreu Emerges as Key Trade Chip ahead of trade deadline
Article Text:
Boston Red Sox base runner Nate Eaton (right) celebrates with Alex Bregman after scoring in the ninth inning (Image via Imagn)

How the Proposed Trade Structure Appears

Hunter Greene of Cincinnati Reds (Image via Getty)

Why the Boston Red Sox Are Interested in Greene

Why the Reds Would Consider Trading Their Ace

Who Benefits Most?





The 2025 MLB offseason has already sparked its share of high-profile rumors, and one of the most talked-about possibilities centers on a potential blockbuster between the Boston Red Sox and the Cincinnati Reds. Several league insiders indicate that Boston is actively exploring moves to strengthen its rotation, and Cincinnati’s electric young ace Hunter Greene has quickly become one of the most discussed names on their radar.As speculation intensifies, the Boston Red Sox are believed to be constructing a competitive package that appeals to the Reds’ long-term offensive needs. Outfielder Wilyer Abreu, coming off a strong 2025 campaign, sits at the core of these discussions, with multiple prospects also viewed as realistic components of a multilateral deal.The rumored framework would send Greene and veteran catcher Jose Trevino to Boston. Cincinnati, in turn, would acquire Abreu along with promising young talents Franklin Arias and Jhostnyxon Garcia.• Red Sox Receive: Hunter Greene (RHP), Jose Trevino (C)• Reds Receive: Wilyer Abreu (OF), Franklin Arias (Prospect), Jhostnyxon Garcia (Prospect)This setup aligns with a familiar MLB pattern: a contending team adds a high-end pitcher with years of control, while a retooling team brings in a controllable offensive piece and valuable farm-system depth.Greene, 26, is coming off an elite showing in 2025, posting a 2.76 ERA, 0.94 WHIP, and a dominant 31.4% strikeout rate while averaging 99.4 mph on his fastball. Though he missed over two months with injuries, his ceiling remains one of the highest among young pitchers. His contract - six years at $53 million with team options - adds to his value, giving Boston an affordable potential ace to anchor its rotation. Trevino’s defensive abilities and leadership further strengthen the Boston Red Sox catching core.Cincinnati’s interest in Abreu is tied to their need for offensive upgrades. The team ranked 24th in Weighted Runs Created Plus and 21st in home runs in 2025, making an impact bat a priority. Abreu, age 26, hit .246 with an .810 OPS and 22 home runs last season. His defense grades in the 90th percentile, though he led MLB with five errors. Arias and Garcia add long-term upside and organizational depth, giving the Reds a more balanced roster outlook.Also read: MLB trade rumors: New York Yankees could sign $102 million New York Mets megastar to bolster squad and improve title odds The Boston Red Sox gains immediately with a frontline pitcher, assuming Greene stays healthy and performs at a Cy Young-level trajectory. Cincinnati, meanwhile, strengthens its lineup and replenishes its prospect pool, potentially laying groundwork for sustained improvement. The ultimate winner depends on performance and development, but the deal presents meaningful benefits for both franchises as the offseason unfolds.
Article Summary: The boston red sox and cincinnati reds are reportedly in talks over a 2025 deal. The red sox are believed to be constructing a competitive package that appeals to the reds’ long-term offensive needs. The rumored framework would send greene and veteran catcher jose trevino to boston.

Article Title: Rob Gronkowski’s longtime partner Camille Kostek expresses her support as he addresses his earlier decision to follow Tom Brady
Article Text:
(Image via Instagram and Getty: Rob Gronkowski, Camille Kostek, and Tom Brady)

Camille Kostek illuminates her Instagram with a joyful tribute to her longtime love, Rob Gronkowski

More coverage on NFL WAGs:





The electric connection between Tom Brady and Rob Gronkowski echoes the dynamic spark we see today with Patrick Mahomes and Travis Kelce, offering a vivid lens for comparison. Brady, a seven-time Super Bowl legend, closed out his storied career with three seasons in Tampa Bay, hanging up his cleats as a Buccaneer in 2023. Gronkowski, never far from the spotlight, first retired from the New England Patriots in March 2019, only to be lured back by Brady for a Tampa Bay reunion. Their partnership delivered fourth Super Bowl win before Gronkowski announced his second retirement in June 2022. But was his heart truly at rest? Perhaps not, since he rewrote his retirement script. On November 12, Rob Gronkowski signed a ceremonial one-day contract with New England at Gillette Stadium in Foxborough, Massachusetts, so he could officially retire as a Patriot after 11 total NFL seasons. Witnessing this emotional homecoming, his longtime partner and SI Swimsuit star Camille Kostek celebrated on Instagram , sharing 11 photos, one supposedly for each season, and declaring him a “Patriot for life.”The first snapshot was taken inside Gillette Stadium, likely from the Patriots' office. The NFL couple stood in business casuals before a backdrop of Gronkowski’s moments as a Patriots player. Camille Kostek wore a dark denim blue co-ord set with a denim shirt and matching wide-legged trousers. Her medium-length wavy blond hair was left down. She wore glossy peach lipstick, blush, and prominent kohl on the corners of her eyes, along with big, round gold earrings.Gronkowski wore a navy-blue suit with a white collared shirt and brown and white shoes. He had a thin goatee and a spiked army cut.The next snapshot showed them with Patriots owner Robert Kraft, who appeared to be signing his one-day contract. Another image showed the Gillette Stadium Jumbotron displaying a big message: “THANK YOU GRONK,” with Patriots’ Super Bowl championship banners above, commemorating six victories. Other images included the four-time Super Bowl champion in an interview or photoshoot, the stadium in its raw form, and Gronkowski chatting with current head coach Mike Vrabel. The coach and the tight end never played together, as Gronkowski was drafted a year before Vrabel was traded. Vrabel played linebacker for the Patriots from 2001 to 2008. The last image is the cutest, featuring the couple’s French bulldog, Ralphie Gronkowski, whom Rob and Camille adopted in February 2021. Ralphie lies comfortably on a sofa, wearing a Patriots jersey.BBC Sport's Sean Kearns reported that Rob Gronkowski fulfilled the dying wish of his friend and charity partner, Susan Hurley, who was also a former Patriots cheerleader and founded CharityTeams in 2008, by signing a one-day contract with the New England Patriots. Hurley died from cancer earlier this month, and before she passed way, she publicly requested Gronkowski to return to the Patriots.
Article Summary: Gronkowski retired from the new england patriots in march 2019, only to be lured back by tom brady for a tampa bay reunion. On november 12, gronkowski signed a ceremonial one-day contract with new england so he could officially retire as a patriot after 11 total nfl seasons.

Article Title: Oscar Piastri gets honest support from Valtteri Bottas as McLaren pressure grows late in season
Article Text:
Oscar Piastri gets honest support from Valtteri Bottas as McLaren pressure grows late in season (Image Via Getty)

Valtteri Bottas supports Oscar Piastri and says F1 can be “not a fair sport”





Oscar Piastri is watching his 2025 Formula 1 title hopes fade as his lead over teammate Lando Norris has fully disappeared. Earlier in the season, Oscar Piastri was ahead by 34 points. But now, in November, he is 24 points behind after a tough run of races. This swing happened after the summer break, and it has placed the young Australian under heavy pressure during an important part of the season.Lando Norris has been very strong since the break. Among his four consecutive podium finishes are major victories in Brazil and Mexico. His Mexico victory came with a substantial 30-second lead; his victory in Brazil came with a clear 10-second lead. On the other hand, Oscar Piastri hasn't stepped onto the podium since Monza, six races ago. Including Valtteri Bottas's comments, this disparity has sparked several paddock talks.Valtteri Bottas spoke about Oscar Piastri’s situation this week and showed strong support. He told 7News Adelaide that he knew the feeling well from his time racing with Lewis Hamilton at Mercedes between 2017 and 2021.Valtteri Bottas said, “I’ve been there. Been there, mate. It’s a tough sport.It’s not a fair sport. Sometimes you just deal with it. Oscar has so much time ahead of him. He has a great career ahead. Sometimes you need patience.”Valtteri Bottas also talked to CODE Sports, saying he still hopes Oscar Piastri can win the 2025 title. He said, “I am rooting for him for the title. He still has a chance.”Including the Qatar Grand Prix, which has a Sprint Race with eight bonus points, Oscar Piastri has three race weekends remaining to narrow the 24-point margin. Just 25 points behind Oscar Piastri, Max Verstappen is also battling for second in the championship.Former Haas head Guenther Steiner also offered Oscar Piastri some harsh words. He suggested Oscar Piastri quit McLaren if he is unable to return better following this year.Guenther Steiner said Oscar Piastri faced “mysterious problems” during the American races and had to change parts of his driving style.Also Read: Olympic Legend Surya Bonaly Loses All Her Medals To Las Vegas Thieves While Caring For Her Cancer-Stricken Mother Steiner said Oscar Piastri must reset over the winter or think about switching teams.The next race is the Las Vegas Grand Prix, where McLaren struggled in 2024. Oscar Piastri now needs very strong results in the final stretch of the season to stay alive in the title fight.
Article Summary: Oscar piastri is 24 points behind teammate lando norris in f1 championship. Valtteri bottas says f1 can be 'not a fair sport' and that oscar piastri still has a chance. Guenther steiner suggested oscarpiastri quit mclaren if he is unable to return better.

Article Title: New Orleans Pelicans cut ties with Willie Green after a brutal 2-10 collapse
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

New Orleans Pelicans front office ends Willie Green’s tenure hours after reviewing the team’s direction





The New Orleans Pelicans made a clear and firm decision when they fired Willie Green only hours after a 118-104 home loss to the Los Angeles Lakers on November 14. The move came after a start that did not meet the standards of a team coming off a 49-33 season. New Orleans opened 0-6 and became the first team in NBA history to lose three of its first six games by at least 30 points. The team also allowed 120 points or more in each of its first five games, marking the worst defensive opening in franchise history.These results left little room for interpretation. The performance level was not close to what the roster was built for, and the front office responded. Willie Green addressed the pressure earlier in the season and spoke about staying focused on the players, but the issues remained the same across multiple games. If you look at how the season went, the firing was based strictly on the on-court product and the urgent need to change direction. The Pelicans acted decisively because the stats from the early weeks supported a major adjustment.Pelicans Executive Vice President of Basketball Operations Joe Dumars delivered the news in a statement released by the team on Saturday morning. "After careful evaluation, we have made the difficult decision to make a change at head coach," Dumars said in the official announcement.He added, "I have the utmost respect for Willie Green, and I’m sincerely appreciative of his contributions to the Pelicans organization and the New Orleans community. We wish him and his family all the best in the future."Team owner Gayle Benson backed the move in a separate statement issued the same day. "I have tremendous admiration and respect for Willie Green, and I truly appreciate all he has done for our organization over the last few years," Benson said. "This is a tough business and these are difficult decisions."In a recent interview prior to the firing, Benson had expressed urgency about the team's direction, "We need to improve immediately. Our roster is built for success right now." She also reiterated her confidence in Dumars, stating, "I really like Willie Green, but I hired Joe Dumars to assess our basketball operation. And that’s what he is doing."Dumars had previously defended retaining Green after a disappointing 21-61 finish in the 2024-25 season, the second-worst record in franchise history for an 82-game campaign. Speaking to media in May 2025, Dumars said, "I'm looking forward to going forward and working with Willie and to push us to success. You've got to set the bar. And that's what we're going to do." He focused on the desired style of play, adding, "The style of play — resilience, toughness, playing hard, never quit — that’s what we want people to see right away. "The New Orleans Pelicans were done hoping the same approach would fix itself. Willie Green had four-plus seasons and two playoff runs, but the early problems kept repeating. Add injuries to Zion Williamson and Dejounte Murray, and the team looked stuck again. Putting James Borrego in charge is their attempt to wake the roster up before the season gets even harder to recover from.Also Read: Stephen Curry seen rocking Nike just a day after ending his Under Armour partnership in a match against San Antonio Spurs
Article Summary: New orleans pelicans front office ends willie green's tenure hours after reviewing the team’s direction. The move came after a start that did not meet the standards of a team coming off a 49-33 season. New orleans opened 0-6 and became the first team in nba history to lose three of its first six games by at least 30 points.

Article Title: Sunrisers Hyderabad Retained and Released Players: SRH IPL 2026 Retention List
Article Text:
Sunrisers Hyderabad

IPL 2026 retained players: Who stayed where and for how much

Full List of Players Retained by SRH for IPL 2026

Players Released by SRH Ahead of IPL 2026 Auction





As the 2026 Indian Premier League (IPL) approaches, Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) enter the new season with a decade’s worth of highs, lows, reinventions, heartbreaks, and historic moments behind them. Since their inception in 2013, SRH have built a reputation as one of the league’s most resilient and tactically sharp sides, known first for their world-class bowling core and, in recent years, for a fearless batting revolution that has rewritten IPL record books.Their journey through the seasons tells the story of a team constantly evolving, constantly fighting.SRH burst onto the scene in 2013 with a playoff finish and peaked in 2016, lifting their maiden IPL title under David Warner after a thrilling victory over Royal Challengers Bangalore, now Royal Challengers Bengaluru.What followed was an era of consistency, five straight playoff appearances from 2016 to 2020, including a runners-up finish in 2018. But the years after brought turbulence. Between 2021 and 2023, SRH endured some of their toughest campaigns, finishing in the bottom three each season.The turning point arrived in 2024, when Pat Cummins’s aggressive leadership and a revamped squad powered SRH to a spectacular resurgence.They shattered the all-time IPL score twice, dominated with an explosive top order, and reached the final, eventually finishing runners-up to Kolkata Knight Riders. The momentum faltered in 2025, a season marked by inconsistency, but SRH still clawed their way to a respectable 6th-place finish after a late surge.Now, heading into IPL 2026, the franchise stands at another crucial moment. With key retentions shaping the core and a blend of experience, youth, and firepower, SRH look ready to script their next chapter, one that aims to reclaim playoff stability and push once again for the title.Travis Head, Abhishek Sharma, Aniket Verma, B Smaran, Ishan Kishan, Heinrich Klaasen, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Harsh Dubey, Kamindu Mendis, Harshal Patel, Brydon Carse, Pat Cummins, Jaydev Unadkat, Eshan Malinga, Zeeshan AnsariAbhinav Manohar, Atharva Taide, Sachin Baby, Wiaan Mulder, Mohammed Shami, Smarjeet Singh, Rahul Chahar, Adam Zampa
Article Summary: Sunrisers hyderabad (srh) enter the new season with a decade’s worth of highs, lows, reinventions, heartbreaks, and historic moments behind them. Srh burst onto the scene in 2013 with a playoff finish and peaked in 2016, lifting their maiden ipl title under david warner. But the years after brought turbulence.

Article Title: Rajasthan Royals Retained and Released Players: RR IPL 2026 Retention List
Article Text: Rajasthan Royals have made significant player movements ahead of the IPL 2026 mega auction. Star batter Sanju Samson has been traded to Chennai Super Kings for Ravindra Jadeja and Sam Curran. Additionally, Nitish Rana moves to Delhi Capitals for Donovan Ferreira. The Royals now have INR 16.05 crore and nine slots to fill.
Article Summary: Sanju samson has been traded to chennai super kings for ravindra jadeja and sam curran. Nitish rana moves to delhi capitals for donovan ferreira. Rajasthan royals now have inr 16.05 crore and nine slots to fill.
